text: Knema retusa is a species of plant in the family Myristicaceae. It is a tree endemic to Peninsular Malaysia. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== * World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Knema retusa. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species.
